aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.paragraph1: Desyatka is a quality sausage and meat delicacies store with delivery to homes and offices from Barcelona to Murcia. We created our service for those who value quality and authentic taste — from traditional cooked sausages to meat delicacies.
aboutUs.advantage1: Proven quality — we work with the most reliable supplier from Poland using proven recipes, only meat and spices, without additives and harmful preservatives.
aboutUs.advantage2: Fast and stable delivery on a planned schedule — flexible conditions for the customer.
aboutUs.advantage3: Wide assortment — smoked and cooked sausages, hot dogs, fillets, and much more.
aboutUs.suitableForTitle: Who our products are suitable for:
aboutUs.suitableFor2: We deliver products to both private clients (families, offices) and restaurants, shops, cafes, hotels, and boarding houses.
aboutUs.suitableFor3: We work with individuals and businesses: HoReCa, retail, catering.
aboutUs.conclusion: Price plus quality, an unsurpassed argument for our products — try them, and you will definitely want to have such products on your table constantly!

orderProducts.title: Ordering Products
orderProducts.introduction: At our Desyatka store, you can order any meat products presented in our catalog. To do this, select the product you're interested in, specify the quantity, and click the 'Add to Cart' button.
orderProducts.cartProcess: After selecting all the products you need, go to your cart, check the selected items and their quantities, then click the 'Checkout' button.
orderProducts.checkoutProcess: The checkout process is very simple: provide your contact information, select or add a delivery address, and optionally leave additional comments for your order. On the order review page, you can verify all information before submission.
orderProducts.afterOrder: After clicking the 'Place Order' button, you will receive a confirmation email. Shortly after, our staff will contact you to confirm the details of your order and provide delivery information.
orderProducts.contactImportance: Please make sure to provide a correct delivery address and phone number. If the phone number is incorrect or unavailable for an extended period, we unfortunately will not be able to deliver your order.
orderProducts.orderMethods: You can order meat products 24/7 through our online store, or by calling directly at +34 652 34 65 51 from 9:00 to 20:00. Delivery is typically available on the next business day after placing your order.
orderProducts.holidays: During holidays and weekends, our working hours may change. Updated information is published in the News section.

homepage.title: Welcome to Desyatka — the best online shop for natural meat products!
homepage.introduction: Order high-quality meat products and beef delivered straight to your home or office in Spanish cities from Barcelona to Marbella on Costa del Sol. Once you place an order, a member of our team will contact you to confirm the delivery time and address. We offer flexible delivery discounts and a premium loyalty program for regular customers.
homepage.advantagesTitle: Why should you shop with us?
homepage.advantage1: Save time and effort. Forget about wasting time and expenses on trips to supermarkets searching for products and standing in long queues — we bring everything to you while you focus on your activities.
homepage.advantage2: Quality and freshness. Our products are supplied from Polish meat processing plants, including the major exporter Animex, ensuring the highest quality products.
homepage.advantage3: Check and compare our prices — we have one price for all products, the best in Spain. All premium quality products at just 10 euros per kilogram. Buy, try and appreciate it.
homepage.advantage4: If you can't find a particular product in our range, order it from us and we'll try to deliver it to you. It will appear in the catalog for your next order. Just let us know through our feedback form.

productDelivery.title: Delivery Terms
productDelivery.contactSection: Customer contact. A member of our team will reach out to confirm the delivery time and address.
productDelivery.feesSection: Fees. Delivery cost depends on your order total and distance — the larger the order, the lower the fee, and large orders are delivered free of charge. Rates for remote areas are set individually.
productDelivery.stairsSection: Stair carry. In buildings without elevators, an additional fee may apply for carrying heavy orders upstairs; it is calculated based on weight and number of floors.
productDelivery.phoneSection: Phone number. Please provide a valid phone number and keep it available; without confirmation, the order will not be dispatched.
productDelivery.conclusion: We deliver fresh meat products in Spain along the Costa del Sol coast quickly and reliably!
